sections.title: Chorus
content: Suffer little children to come unto
For such is the kingdom of heaven.
Suffer little children to come unto me
For theirs the kingdom of the Lord.

sections.title: Verse 1
content: They came unto Him children, Little Children
That He might lay His hands upon them,
Pray for and Bless them.
Children, Little Children
Gather-around the Lord.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: The Disciples said, Children, Little Children
Leave the master to His prayer,
He called them and said,
Children little children
Gather around the Lord.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: But Jesus said, children, little children
Stay my Blessing to receive,
Forbid not that children, little children,
Shall gather around the Lord.

sections.title: Verse 4
content: For you must be like children, little children,
Humble, simple, pure in heart,
Children, Little Children,
Thy kingdom of heaven belong.
